Event: Western Liang (Sixteen Kingdoms): Li Gao declares himself Duke of Liang in Dunhuang{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcvii}}
Western Qin: Submits to Southern Liang and then Later Qin{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=547}}
Southern Yan: Murong De declares himself emperor in Guanggu{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Northern Liang: Juqu Mengxun kills Duan Ye and declares himself Duke of Zhangye{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Huan Xuan sacks Jiankang and Sun En dies, but his lieutenant Lu Xun takes over{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Later Liang: Surrenders to Later Qin{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Huan Xuan declares himself emperor and dies the same year{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Qiao Zong declares himself Prince of Chengdu{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Xia: Helian Bobo declares himself Heavenly King{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
Northern Yan: Gao Yun is set up as heavenly king and replaces Later Yan{{sfn|Xiong|2009|p=xcviii}}
